<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>oauth_entity</collection> <condition>!current.sys_id.nil()</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Find Profiles Without Assertion Producer</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
// Get all the SAML2 grant type oauth_entity_profile(s) that are associated with current Oauth Entity // and have missing SAML2 Assertion Producer reference. var gr = new GlideRecord("oauth_entity_profile"); gr.initialize(); gr.addQuery("oauth_entity", current.sys_id); gr.addQuery("grant_type", 'urn:ietf:params:oauth:grant-type:saml2-bearer'); gr.addNullQuery("saml2_assertion_producer"); gr.query();
// Show a error message on top if there are 1 or more such oauth_entity_profile(s). if(gr.getRowCount()>0){ var msg = gs.getMessage('Your configuration has missing SAML2 Assertion producer records in one or more entity profiles. A SAML2 Assertion producer record must be mapped to the entity profile record when grant type is SAML2 Bearer.'); gs.addErrorMessage(msg); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-02-09 06:36:46</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>10d21e79b721011044d59564ae11a939</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Find Profiles Without Assertion Producer</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="OAuth 2.0" source="com.snc.platform.security.oauth">d3b3b0a43c31311068bcf327dfe37fc4</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_10d21e79b721011044d59564ae11a939</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-10-10 23:01:55</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before_display</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=10d21e79b721011044d59564ae11a939"/> </record_update>
